file_content.text: I've got to hand it to CorSec--they know how to build an interrogation droid.
I have the interrogation droids.
Lovely. I'll have our technicians prep them immediately. May need to adjust a few settings.
My goal is to have those Jedi talking by the end of the day. For their sake, I hope they do.
Can't wait to start loosening some Jedi tongues.
Urgh! These stupid Green Jedi are so... stupid! Won't tell me anything about the rebels' plans!
Now the locals, they're easy. Threaten their families and they'll sing their hearts out.
But these Jedi... nothing works on them! They just stare at you, make you feel all awkward and... stupid.
You have Green Jedi in your custody?
They're your prisoners?
Yes, but they're not talking.
What's happening?
Speaking of stupid....
I'm usually really good at this, I swear!
One of the rebel sympathizers we captured mentioned a big attack in the works. Didn't have any details, though.
I'm positive the Green Jedi know something about this. We just have to coax it out of them--aggressively, if need be.
That's more like it.
Shall I?
That's more like it.
Er, let's not get too aggressive. Had something in mind, actually.
Don't we have interrogation droids for this sort of thing?
Use droids.
Not on hand, no, but I know where we can find some.
It's possible they don't know anything.
Maybe you're wrong.
Oh, they know something. Just look at their smug little... yeah, they know.
No need to hurt them.
I've used every non-violent tactic in the book: threats, negotiation, sweet-talk.... Now the gloves are coming off.
CorSec used interrogation droids--good ones, too. We're talking scary effective, but the Republic confiscated them all. Didn't approve.
I'll bet those droids could break the Jedi's resolve. If only we could get our hands on a couple....
I'll get them.
Oh, good, you picked up on my not-so-subtle plea for help. Nice of you.
Any idea how?
Something like that.
We know where the Republic is storing the confiscated droids. Locked up tight, but the guards should have keys.
Just drop the guards, swipe the droids, and then we'll see how resilient those Jedi really are.
Waste of time. [Refuse quest]
Well, nothing else is working!
The Green Jedi are really starting to cheese me off.
